title: [BUG] crash on new note save with markdown code image url
body:
**Describe the bug**
Specific markdown crashes the app

**To Reproduce**
 Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to notes
2. Click on new note
3. Paste in the description
```
Image

![](https://jtx.techbee.at/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/Markdown-930x620.jpg)


```
5. Click save
**Expected behavior**
Note saved without crash even if the markdown syntax is incorrect

**Screenshots**


**Device and version**
 - Device: poco x3 nfc
 - Android version: Android 14
 - jtx Board version: 2.10.00.ose
 - Downloaded from: f-droid
comments:
Thanks @joao-matos , this is a problem in the underlying library, I've opened a bug report. 

Depends on https://github.com/ArnyminerZ/MarkdownText/issues/155
